name: KaijuCrisis
description:
Made for the UT Gamma 3D Capstone course of 2018. 

Pilot a mech in VR, and defend a Russian-inspired city against waves of Kaiju.

An Xbox controller and VR Headset are highly recommended, although not strictly required.

A note: if playing with a dualshock controller, Square is the confirmation button in menus, not X.
